title: Nikki Bella Shows Off Insane Body While Out With Boyfriend Artem
text:
Nikki Bella commanded attention from onlookers while on a simple coffee run, and even her boyfriend could hardly keep his hands off the former WWE wrestler.

35-year-old Bella was seen Monday strolling through Studio City with Artem Chigvintsev as they picked up coffee and checked out a newsstand.

Video: Bella Admits She Questions Decision to Split From John Cena

Related:

WWE Superstar Dolph Ziggler Takes Shot at 'Heavy Machinery' After Retaining Tag Team Title

WWE Superstars Shower The Miz & Maryse With Love After Baby's Birth!

The Rock Thinks Drew McIntyre Is The Next Big WWE Superstar

WWE IIconics Tag Team Wild Bachelorette Party In Las Vegas

Dave Bautista Names the Next Movie Star to Come Out of the WWE

View photos

Nikki was showing off her tight abs in a long sleeved pink crop top paired with ripped jeans, and it's clear she's been hitting the gym hard.

Her former "DWTS" partner, and current romantic partner, also agreed she looked amazing and could barely stop from caressing her at every chance he got.

View photos

The couple was also seen sharing a passionate kiss, letting everyone know they're not afraid to pour on the PDA.

View photos

Even though the two stars only went public with their relationship earlier this year, fans already want them to hurry up and get married.
description: he can barely keep his hands off her!
